item.title: Videographer needed for Chicago conference - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an experienced videographer to record a full day of live presentations at a corporate conference in Chicago's West Loop on July 17th.

Own equipment needed - hours would be approx. 8:30am-4:30pm on 7/17

Hourly Range: $50.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 10:22 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Camera, Video Editing
Skills: Videography, Camera, Video Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply
